creator: ash_5@gravitywell.org
text:
Just noticed a discrepency in the apachetop man pages.
apachetop --help show the option of -d for refresh delay of seconds.
where as the man page say it's supposed to be -r ,which is wrong, -d is correct.

creator: takashi.asfbugzilla@tks.st
text: apachetop is not a part of apache httpd.
